title: What I have done so far...
subtitle: My Career TimeLine

content.title: Research Scholar
points: Published 12+ Research papers, a book chapter, attended 4 international conferences.
Availed DST-SERB fund by the GOI to attend an international conference.
MATLAB programming, Inverse heat transfer, FEM based steel phase transformation, artificial neural network are some of the important skill sets acquired and applied during research.

content.title: Research Engineer
content.company_name: Rapsri Engineering Products Company Ltd., Harohalli
points: Leading various R&D activities in the industry and collaborating with external organizations for carrying out research projects.
Casting Rejection control by process control and changing casting design.
Value engineering and redesign customer products with an objective of easing manufacturing process.

content.title: Senior Engineer
points: Creating and analysing material cards and Spot weld cards.
Analyse the material property needs asked by the Stellantis N.V.(client) design and innovation engineers and providing technical expertise/feedback.
Carry out or steer the establishment of laws of behaviour from the test results
Leading the team for interaction with the client for all the technical aspects, internal service documentation and training support documentation.
Achievement: Successfully reduced lead time for the tasks by 50% by developing interactive automation tools using Excel-VBA, Ansa-Python and Metapost-Python Routines.

content.title: Assistant Manager
content.company_name: Renault Nissan Technology and Business Center Pvt. Ltd., Chennai
points: Part of Research and Advanced engineering team for Nissan cars.
Presently working on projects for enhancing occupant and padestrian safety.
The objective of the project is to provide design guidelines in the context of impending vehicular safety regulations/ rating criteria.
Work involves accident data analysis and simulation studies to arrive at design guidelines
The major area of simulation study is focused on vehicle crash and biomechanical simulation.
